loans.name: Gregorio

texts.es:
El socio tiene 80 años de edad,es casado y teine 4 hijos,el socio se dedica al negocio de restaurant y tambien vende cerveza,en el negocio de restaurant el junto con su esposa preparan platos como pollo al horno,sopas y saltado de carne,el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,el sueño del socio es ampliar el negocio de restaurant.El socio solicita el credito para comprar productos para cocinar como pollo,carne y verduras.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The member, Gregorio, is 80 years old, married and has 4 children. He has a restaurant and also sells beer. He works together with his wife in the restaurant preparing dishes such as baked chicken, soups and stir-fry meat dishes. He works from 8:00AM until 6:00PM. His dream is to expand the restaurant. He is asking for a loan to buy ingredients for cooking such as chicken, meat and vegetables. He is happy for the loan and promises to pay in a timely manner.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for cooking such as chicken, meat and vegetables for his restaurant where he prepares dishes alongside his wife

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Segundo Cristian

texts.es:
Segundo es joven de 20 años que realizó sus estudios primarios en Alausí en donde reside actualmente. Alausí es un cantón de la Provincia de Chimborazo en Ecuador la cual se caracteriza por su estructura arquitectónica en piedra y flores que la convirtieron en un atractivo turístico muy visitado y que además le dieron el título de Patrimonio Nacional. A lo largo de la ciudad se encuentran varios sitios naturales que valen la pena ser visitados por el paisaje tan esplendoroso que ofrecen. La actividad turística, la agricultura, el comercio se fortalecen cada día para que la ciudad tenga un desarrollo sostenido y que sus habitantes tengan una mejor calidad de vida ya que no todas las viviendas cuentan con todos los servicios básicos.
Segundo nació en el campo donde aprendió el oficio de la agricultura y ganadería gracias a sus padres. Dedica a esta actividad 8 horas diarias y decidió emprender en esta actividad ya que la falta de capacitación no le permitían emplearse en el sector privado. Utilizará el crédito otorgado por Fundación Alternativa en la compra de cerdos los cuales criará con insumos que también comprará y de esta forma los comercializará en la ciudad. Así, Segundo pretende obtener mayores ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Segundo is a 20-year-old youth who did his primary school studies in Alausí, where he currently lives. Alausí is a canton of the Province of Chimborazo en Ecuador, which is characterized by its stone architecture and flowers that have converted it into a very visited tourist attraction, which in addition has been given the title of a National Heritage Site. Throughout the city, there are various nature spots that are worth visiting for the splendid landscapes they offer. Tourism, agriculture and commercial activity become stronger every day, because the city has a sustained development and its inhabitants have a better quality of life since not all homes have the basic services.
Segundo was born in the countryside where he learned agricultural and livestock activities from his parents. He works for eight hours a day and decided to start this business because his lack of training does not allow him to be employed in the private sector. He will use the loan granted by Fundación Alternativa to purchase pigs that he will raise with the supplies that he will also buy and then sell them in the city. In this way, Segundo aims to increase his income and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy pigs and supplies to raise them.

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es:
Jorge tiene 26 años es soltero y chofer de profesión vive en Santo Domingo la capital de la Provincia de Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas, una provincia de Ecuador que en los últimos años ha tenido un alto crecimiento sostenido. Su capital  es una ciudad en donde lo más atractivo y llamativo son sus deliciosas frutas, y muchos lugares turísticos por visitar. También cuenta con un comercio considerable  ya que se ha convertido en un puerto terrestre de intercambio comercial entre las regiones Sierra y Costa del país. Además cuenta con varios atractivos turísticos que acompañados de su clima cálido son muy concurridos por turistas nacionales y extranjeros. 
Jorge se dedica a la cría de animales domésticos que después son comercializados, se dedica a esta actividad todo el tiempo y ahora necesita mejorar la estructura de los criaderos de animales llamados “chiqueros” para que de esta forma él pueda vender los animales a un mejor precio y así obtener mayores ingresos, es por esto que solicitó un crédito que le permitirá adquirir las herramientas y materiales que necesita para realizar este trabajo y así salir adelante ya que la falta de educación no le permiten encontrar oportunidades en otro sector o industria.
texts.en:
Jorge is a single 26 year-old professional chauffeur.  He lives in Santo Domingo, the capital of Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas province in Ecuador which has seen sustainable growth over the last several years.  The capital city's most attractive items are the delicious fruits and tourist destinations.  It also serves as an important business hub as it facilitates trade between the Sierra and Costa del Pais regions.  In addition, the city relies on its attractive tourist destinations that along with it's warm weather attracts many tourists both domestic and foreign.  

Jorge makes a living raising livestock which is then sold on the market.  He does this full-time and now needs to improve the structure of the pigpen so that he is able to sell the animals at a better price thus increasing his income.  For this reason he seeks a loan that will allow him to obtain the tools and materials needed to achieve this goal and be successful despite his lack of education that prevents him from finding opportunities in other industries.

loans.use: to improve the structure of the pigpen.

loans.name: Dossi Edith

texts.fr: Agée de 38 ans, Edith est mariée et mère de 05 enfants scolarisés dont le plus âgé a 15 ans et le moins âgé a 06 ans. Couturière de formation, elle associe à sa formation la vente des céréales et des cartes de recharge depuis des années. Elle s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés de la sous région. Dans le but de renforcer son activité et de satisfaire la demande de ses clients, elle a sollicité et a obtenu un micro crédit à Finadev. Ce crédit lui permettra de maximiser son bénéfice et de participer à la scolarisation de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Edith is 38 years old, married, and mother of five children between the ages of 6 and 15 years old. All of her children have received schooling.

She is a trained couturier and has also been selling grains and calling cards on the side for years now. She stocks up at one of the markets in the sub-region.

She sought and obtained a micro loan from Finadev to help her strengthen her business and satisfy her customers' demand. The loan will allow her to maximize her profits and help pay for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy 10 rolls of poplin and 12 pagnes of all sorts

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a vehicle to deliver food orders to customers' homes.

loans.name: Mariluz

texts.es:
La socia Mariluz pertenece al banco comunal SAN MARTIN DE ZURITE el cual se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Zurite ,provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Mariluz tiene 27 años es conviviente y tiene 01 hijo ,la socia altera sus actividades diarias con el negocio de crianza de animales menores como cuyes y gallinas,la socia cria a estos animalitos para luego venderlos a sus clientes que le solicitan y en las ferias de los fines de semana,la socia lleva buen tiempo en este su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de alimentos como maiz y alfalfa para sus animalitos.
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank San Martin de Zurite which is located in the district of Zurite, province of Anta and the department of Cusco.

The member, Mariluz, is 27 years old, has a life-partner, and one child. She varies her daily activities in the business of raising small animals such as guinea pigs and hens. She breeds the animals in order to sell them later to her customers who ask for them at the weekend markets. Things are going well in her business thanks to her daily efforts in the business. She is trustworthy and persistent which is how she is able to support her family.

She is asking for a loan to buy food such as corn and alfalfa for her animals.

She is grateful for the provided loan and she is committed to completing the payments on time.

loans.use: to buy food such as corn and alfalfa for her small animals

loans.name: Carmen Beatriz

texts.es:
Carmen tiene 35 años, está separada de su cónyuge y vive en el cantón Santo Domingo de la provincia de Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas con su hijo que cursa la escuela secundaria. Santo Domingo se encuentra conectando la Región Sierra con la Región Costa del Ecuador, es una ciudad que se ha convertido en un eje comercial con varios sectores en crecimiento y como prueba se tiene a varias familias emprendedoras que hace algunos años comenzaron con pequeños negocios y ahora son microempresarios que aportan a la generación de empleo. Los estudios revelan que todos los negocios en su mayoría, empezaron empíricamente y han tenido acogida por el paso de turistas, empresarios y viajeros que se trasladan de una región a otra y además que es la tercera ciudad más habitada en el país.
Carmen se dedica a la venta de cosméticos desde hace 5 años y lo realiza de forma ambulante, visitando a sus clientes en sus respectivos hogares o trabajo. El sacrificio de educar a su hijo sin la presencia de su padre es muy duro para ella pero ha demostrado valentía y esfuerzo por lo que planea salir adelante y a pesar de haber cursado solo la primaria ella desea con sus ingresos mejorar la estructura de su casa y acabar la construcción que quedó sin terminar y así darle a su hijo una mejor calidad de vida y un lugar adecuado donde vivir y salir adelante.
texts.en:
Carmen is 35 years old.  She is separated from her spouse and lives with her high-school aged son in the city of Santo Domingo of the Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas province.  Santo Domingo is connected to the Sierra and Costa del Ecuador regions.  The city has become a commercial hub with its many growing sectors evident in the various entrepreneurial families that started small businesses just a few years back and are now creating employment opportunities.  Studies reveal that most businesses started organically and have been supported by the passing of tourists, business people, and travelers who move from one region to the other.  It is also the third most populous city in the country.

Carmen has been making a living selling cosmetics for the last five years.  Her business model is to visit her customers at their respective homes or workplace.  The sacrifice of educating her son without the presence of his father has been very hard for her but she has demonstrated courage and strength as she plans to succeed.  Despite having only attending grade school she wishes to use her income to complete and improve the structure of her home which was left unfinished.  This way she will be able to improve her and her son's quality of life.

loans.use: to improve the quality of life for her son and herself.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy palm oil to add to her current stock

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy leather, foam and other materials for making car seat covers

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy spare parts to sell

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: MIGUEL ES UN HOMBRE DE 47 AÑOS DE EDAD, ESTA CASADO Y TIENE UN HIJO. EL TRABAJA EN UNA FABRICA DE LA CIUDAD Y SU ESPOSA SE DEDICA A CUIDAR DE SU HIJO Y ADEMAS ELLA TIENE UN PEQUEÑO NEGOCIO DE VENTA DE ZAPATOS POR CATALAGO, CON EL CUAL ELLA AYUDA A SU ESPOSO CON LOS GASTOS DE SU FAMILIA. AMBOS HAN VISTO LA NECESIDAD DE REALIZAR UNA CERCA DE SU DOMICILIO PARA MAYOR SEGURIDAD DE SU FAMILIA Y PARA MEJORAR EL ASPECTO DE SU CASA. POR ESTE MOTIVO MIGUEL SOLICITA UN PRESTAMO PARA LLEVAR ACABO ESTE PROYECTO.
texts.en: Miguel is 47 years old, he is married and has one child. He works in a factory in the city and his wife stays home to raise their child, she also runs a small business selling shoes from catalogs, and she is able to help her husband with family expenses. Both have seen the need to construct a fence around their home to provide better security for the family and to improve the look of the house. And so, Miguel is applying for a loan in order to complete this project.

loans.use: To finish a front fence for his house.

loans.name: Soyol-Erdene

texts.en: Mrs. Soyol-Erdene, 23, is a nurse in a medical center. She lives with her mother and her younger brother in a rental ger, a traditional Mongolian nomadic yurt, in the ger district in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. Every month, Soyol-Erdene pays her rental fee, which takes almost her full salary. Recently she found a small plot of land in a convenient place at a cheap price. She decided to take a loan to cover part of the cost of purchasing the land for her family.

loans.use: To cover part of the cost of a small land plot for her family

loans.name: Binh

texts.en:
Binh was born in 1958. Her family is a basic family. Her husband is a retired soldier. His pension is 3,000,000 VND per month. Her three children are married and have their own families. 

Binh sells vegetables in the market and gets about 2,500,000 VND every month. She has done it for 40 years. She has participated in crediting program of SEDA since 2009. The last cycle, she borrowed 9,184,000 VND and repaid this loan on time. In this loan cycle, she wants to borrow 9,632,000 VND to buy vegetables to sell, then she would be able to upgrade her vegetable stall in the market and buy cattle breeds to be raised.

loans.use: to buy vegetables to sell

loans.name: Silvino Bartolome

texts.es:
En Ecuador se encuentra la provincia de Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas provincia caracterizada por su variedad de animales observables en su entorno, es un lugar en el cual la lucha y el emprendimiento es el subsistir diario de toda familia. Es una ciudad clave por ser la conexión principal entre las regiones Sierra y Costa y lo que ha logrado que su capital Santo Domingo sea una ciudad ejemplo en el crecimiento sostenido por la alta actividad del comercio, agricultura y turismo. En esta ciudad es donde reside Silvino, un hombre de 56 años divorciado y que se caracteriza por ser trabajador y muy perseverante.
Silvino se dedica a la venta de naranjas y quesos, negocio al cual se ha dedicado desde hace 5 años. Invierte su tiempo de lunes a domingo para que sus ingresos mejoren y de esta forma terminar la construcción de su vivienda, lo cual no lo ha logrado por la falta de capital. Es su primer crédito en Fundación Alternativa pero está seguro de que siempre se apoyará de esta entidad para el fortalecimiento y crecimiento de su negocio, ya que, recibe de ellos asesoría oportuna y confiable siempre.
texts.en:
In Ecuador you'll find the province of Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas, known for its variety of animals seen in their natural habitat.  It's a place where struggle and enterprise are the daily subsistence of every family.  It's a key region, being the main connection between the mountain and coastal regions, and has managed to make its capital, Santo Domingo, into an exemplary city whose growth is supported by high activity in commerce, agriculture, and tourism.  This is where Silvio lives; he's a fifty-six-year-old divorced man who is known for being hardworking and very persistent.  

Silvino earns his living selling oranges and cheese, a business he's been in for five years.  He invests his time Monday through Friday to increase his income so he can finish construction on his house, which he hasn't managed to do because he's lacked the funds.  This will be his first loan with Fundación Alternativa, but he's sure that he can rely on them to strengthen and grow his business because they always give him timely and reliable financial counsel.

loans.use: to buy oranges and cheese to increase his income so he can finish his house.

loans.name: Eyad

texts.en:
Eyad is a 36-year-old man. He is married and a father to one son and two daughters. He is employed and gets a low salary, which is not enough to cover the family's needs. Eyad is requesting a 1,000 USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the cost of purchasing new living room furniture in order to improve living conditions in his house. Taking this loan will offer to Eyad and his family comfortable furniture so they can enjoy living in their house.

Eyad is photographed in his house.

loans.use: To purchase new living room furniture

loans.name: Mwanakombo

texts.en:
Mwanakombo, 35, is a divorced woman living with her five children in a community in the town of Msambweni, Kenya. For the last two years she’s been working selling food stuffs in a food stall.

Mwanakombo is asking for a loan of 25,000 Kenyan Shillings (KES) to buy wheat flour, meat, rice, sugar and condiments to make the turnover. She hopes to increase sales with the purchase of more ingredients. She also trusts that her profits will increase so that she can support her children with their schooling and continue growing in her business.

She is grateful for the opportunity Kiva and Yehu are giving her.

loans.use: to buy wheat flour, meat, rice, sugar and condiments for her foodstuffs.

loans.name: Shuhrat

texts.ru: Шухрату 32 года. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 1 ребенка. Более 10 лет он работает в типографии оператором печатного оборудования и является одним из добросовестных и трудолюбивых  работников. Его жена учится в университете, а зарплата Шухрата не хватает, чтобы оплатить за ее учебу. Поэтому он запрашивает займ на сумму 12000 сомони для оплаты учебы жены в университете. Он ждет вашу доброту. Помогите ему, пожалуйста,  держать стимул «заботливого мужа» перед женой.
texts.en:
Shuhrat is 32 years old. He is married and raising a child. For over 10 years, Shuhrat has been working as a printing press operator, and is one of the most conscientious and hard-working employees.

Shuhrat's wife attends university, but her husband's salary is insufficient to pay for her education. Therefore, Shuhrat is requesting a loan of 12000 somoni to pay his wife's university tuition, and is counting on your kindness. Please help him remain a supportive husband to his wife.

loans.use: to pay for his wife’s university education

loans.name: Maria Marlene

texts.es:
María es una mujer trabajadora de 39 años cursó estudios de nivel primario, está separada de su pareja y tiene dos hijos adultos que viven de manera independiente y un hijo pequeño con quien ella vive en Atuntaqui una ciudad de la provincia de Imbabura en  el norte del Ecuador.  Atuntaqui es un lugar que goza de muchos lugares históricos que ofrecer a quienes le visitan además de una deliciosa gastronomía que es la favorita de  muchos en el país. otra actividad que es muy conocida en este cantón es la textil, pues el diseño de ropa industrial y artesanal se ha convertido en una actividad que aporta al crecimiento sostenido de la ciudad por lo que las prendas elaboradas son preferidas por su diferente calidad y diseños. Cuenta con un clima agradable que es seco y templado lo que ayuda mantener sus tierras fértiles y por lo tanto aptas para el cultivo de cereales y legumbres. 
María obtiene sus ingresos económicos gracias a la confección de ropa para niños y niñas, la cual aprendió en sus trabajos anteriores en fábricas textiles importantes. Hace 2 años decidió independizarse y emprender con su propio negocio de confección al cual le dedica al menos 8 horas diarias incluidos los sábados en donde recibe eventualmente la ayuda de sus dos hijos adultos. Solicitó un préstamo en Fundación Alternativa con el cual ella podrá comprar materiales e insumos y así poder confeccionar más ropa ya que esta señora trabajadora y aprovechar la experiencia en confección que ella posee y de esta manera mejorar sus ingresos para brindar a su hijo los beneficios y educación que ella sueña. María agradece a Fundación Alternativa el apoyo que brinda a los emprendedores con el fin de disminuir la pobreza que existe en el país.
texts.en:
María is a hard working woman of 39 years, she finished primary school, and is now separated from her boyfriend and has two adult children who live independently from her as well as one small child who lives with her in Atatunaqai, a city in the province of Imababura in the north of Ecuador. Atatunqai is place that enjoys many historic sites to offer the people who visit it, as well as its delicious gastronomic tradition that is a favorite for many in the country. Another activity that is well known is textiles, as the development of industrial and artisan clothing has become an economic activity that supports a sustained growth in the city and the clothing articles are preferred because of their quality and designs. The city has an agreeable climate that is dry and cloudy, which helps maintain fertile lands and is perfect for the cultivation of cereals and legumes. 
María makes her money by making clothing for children-boys and girls, a skill she learned in previous jobs in important textile factories. Two years ago she decided to start and invest in her own business, where she works 8 hours a day, including Saturdays, and where she receives help from her two adult children. She is applying for a loan from  Fundación Alternativa, which she will use to purchase materials and supplies in order to make more clothing, This hard working woman wants to take advantage of the talent she has and be able to improve her earnings and be able to give her children the benefits and education that she dreams of. María is grateful to Fundación Alternativa for the support she receives with the overarching goal of the organization of reducing poverty in her country.

loans.use: purchase cloth and supplies.

loans.name: Jose Arturo

texts.es: EL SR. JOSE TIENE 52 AÑOS DE EDAD, ESTA CASADO CON FLOR Y TIENEN 2 HIJOS. DESDE HACE MAS DE 5 AÑOS JOSE TIENE UNA TIENDA DE ABARROTES Y CARNICERIA EN LA CUAL EL Y SU ESPOSA SE DEDICAN HA ATENDER. Y GRACIAS A ESTE NEGOCIO EL SR. MIGUEL HA PODIDO CUBRIR LAS NECESIDADES DE SU FAMILIA. PERO ACTUALMENTE SE LE PRESENTO UN PROBLEMA, YA QUE SU MAQUINA PARA CORTAR CARNE SE DESCOMPUSO Y TUVO PROBLEMAS CON SUS VENTAS EN EL NEGOCIO. POR ESTA RAZON EL SOLICITA EL PRESTAMO YA QUE LLEVARA ACABO LA COMPOSTURA DE SU MAQUINA CORTADORA DE CARNE, CON LA CUAL PODRA MEJORAR SUS VENTAS EN LA CARNICERIA.
texts.en: Mr. Jose is 52 years old, he is married to Flor and they have two children. For more than 5 years, Jose has had a grocery store and butcher shop in which both he and his wife work. Thanks to this business, he has been able to cover the costs of necessities for his family. But now he is presented with a problem, since his machine that cuts the meat is broken and he has seen a decrease in sales. For this reason, he is applying for a loan that will help him fix his meat cutter and the be able to improve his sales at the butcher shop again.

loans.use: repair a machine in his shop.

loans.name: Roberth

texts.en:
Being a ship’s officer is the goal of Roberth, a student of the Academy of Maritime Nusantara taking nautical course work. 

Roberth is the second child of three brothers. His father had died in an accident. His mother did not have any special skills, so she does not work. 

During his early studies Roberth was financed by his grandfather. Roberth is in a very hopeless economic condition as a member of an underprivileged family. His brother was not willing to study because the condition of the family economy. 

Roberth wants to study, because he does not want to end his learning  in high school. Roberth is very grateful to God, even though he lives without a father, but God touched the whole family's life. 

Roberth is very grateful for the participation of Kiva, whose loans he hopes will be given, thus providing him impetus to be more diligent and work harder to learn.

loans.use: To pay education fees for three years.

loans.name: Feliza

texts.en:
Feliza is 35 years old, married and has three school-age children. They live happily in a rural community aiming to become successful in the future. 

To achieve their goals, she engages herself in buying and selling Magnolia and Pure Foods products and grocery items. These are the major products  that she sells in their community. Being kind and friendly to others, she wins many customers who make orders with her. 

She aims to strengthen her business to earn sufficient income to finance the education of her children. To improve the business, she plans to acquire more of the said products to sell in their community. 

Due to inadequate capital, she is asking for a loan of PHP 50,000 to buy Magnolia and Pure Foods products and grocery items to sell. Through this financial assistance, she believes that she will work out her plan and hops that someday, she will make the business grow into a viable sources of income.

loans.use: to buy Magnolia and Pure Foods products and grocery items for sale.

location.town: Brgy. La Torre North, Bayombong,Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Mwanahamisi

texts.en:
Mwanahamisi is 40 years old. She is a widow and has three children. She has worked all her life selling seafood, fried as well as fresh. She learned this business from her parents, who taught her since she was a little one how to work with seafood. She buys the seafood wholesale from the local fishermen.

The loan that she is requesting from Yehu will be used to buy more fresh fish for selling. She wants to take advantage of this time since the price of fish is low and she can buy a larger quantity of fish. If she has greater sales she will have more income, which will allow her to cover the family expenses, and have a steady business.

Mwanahamisi hopes that with her work and the help of Yehu and Kiva, she can expand her business to offer better life for her children.

loans.use: to buy more fresh fish for selling.

loans.name: Daler

texts.ru: Далеру 20 лет. Он молодой, энергичный и приятный молодой человек. Далер с отличными оценками поступил на первый курс Таджикского Открытого Института, в факультет менеджмент туризма. Среди однокурсников Далер уже имеет хороший статус и уважение. Он очень любит читать зарубежную литературу. В свободное время он занимается спортом. Особенно он играет футбол. Далер еще не женился и живет с родителями. Зарплата его родителей не хватает оплатить за учебу в институте и поэтому он запрашивает займ. Он надеется на вашу доброту. Давайте, ему поможем стать хорошим специалистом и таким образом осуществить его заветную мечту!
texts.en:
Daler is 20 years of age. He is an energetic and agreeable young man. With perfect high school marks, Daler has entered the Faculty of Tourism Management of the Tajik Open University. He has already established a favourable reputation among his peers and has earned their respect. Daler loves to read foreign literature, and participates in sports, particularly soccer, in his free time. He is still single and lives with his parents.

Daler's parents' salaries are insufficient to pay for their son's university education, and so Daler is requesting a loan. He is counting on your kindness. Together, let's help him become a qualified specialist in his chosen profession and make his dream come true!

loans.use: to pay his university tuition

loans.name: Yucela Epifania

texts.es:
Yucela es una mujer de 31 años está casada con Manuel de 34 y es albañil ellos tienen 2 hijos de 14 y 3 años. Esta humilde familia vive en Santo Domingo la ciudad capital de la Provincia de Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas, un lugar que  tiene un comercio muy activo ya que se ha convertido en un puerto terrestre de intercambio entre sierra y costa de Ecuador. Además la visita de turistas nacionales y extranjeros aporta al fortalecimiento de las actividades de los emprendedores que desde hace algunos años han establecido sus negocios alrededor de toda la ciudad. Esta ciudad que es la tercera más habitada de la región, también contribuye con actividades como la agricultura, ganadería, pesca y manufactura. 
Yucela vende víveres y artículos de primea necesidad para consumo de sus clientes, trabaja todo el día de lunes a domingo con la ayuda de su esposo quien le presta su ayuda principalmente las tardes. Aprendió esta actividad de algunos amigos y ya lleva 9 años generando ingresos mediante este negocio. Esta mujer trabajadora solicitó  un préstamo para poder comprar e invertir en una gran variedad de productos para sus clientes   y de tal forma recuperar la inversión que a su vez también le ayudará para poder alcanzar su sueño de tener una casa en la cual pueda vivir con su familia en las mejores condiciones. Yucela agradece a Fundación Alternativa la asesoría, confianza y buena atención que le brindan para poder cumplir sus sueños y continuar con su negocio.
texts.en:
Yucela is 31 years old. She married to Manuel who is 34 and is a bricklayer. They have 2 children who are 14 and 3 years old. 

This humble family lives in Santo Domingo, the capital city of the Province of Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas, a place that has a very active trade as it has become a land port of exchange between and mountains and the coast of Ecuador. Also, the visits in recent years by domestic and international tourists strengthens the activities of entrepreneurs that have established businesses around the city. This city is the third most populous in the area, also contributing to the activities of agriculture, livestock, fishing and manufacturing.

Yucela sells food and staples for use by her customers. She works all day from Monday to Sunday with the help of her husband who helps mainly in the afternoons. She learned this activity from some friends and has been earning income this way for nine years. 

This hardworking woman applied for a loan in order to buy and invest in a variety of products for her customers, and thus getting back her investment, while helping her to reach her dream of having a house with which to live in with her family in better conditions. 

Yucela is grateful to Fundación Alternativa for the advice, trust and good care that they provide so that she can fulfill her dreams and continue her work.

loans.use: to buy merchandise in order to offer a variety to her customers

loans.name: Maria America

texts.es:
María tiene 55 años está casada con Amilcar de 59 años y es agricultor desde hace 20 años, tienen un hijo y viven en el Puyo una ciudad que en medio de la selva amazónica al occidente de la provincia de Pastaza y a 924 m. sobre el nivel del mar es la capital de esta provincia. Es demográficamente pequeña pero tiene una gran variedad de sitios que son los preferidos para turistas nacionales e internacionales sobre todo los de actividades ecológicas y de deportes extremos. Una ciudad que crece económicamente cada día por las actividades de comercio, ganadería, agricultura y turismo, por lo que en ella se han establecido sucursales de empresas financieras y comerciales que pretenden aprovechar la actividad económica que mantiene esta ciudad.
María hace 3 años decidió adquirir para la venta; productos naturales para la salud en vista de que éstos le habían ayudado a ella en restablecer su salud y vitalidad. A pesar del escaso apoyo de su familia y de la desconfianza de las personas hacia estos productos, María siguió adelante con la venta y por eso solicitó un préstamo en Fundación Alternativa para comprar productos que pueda mantener en stock y ofertarlos en un buen precio a sus clientes y de esta forma contribuir a la recuperación de salud de sus ellos. María espera incrementar las ganancias para apoyar a su esposo con la manutención de su hogar y educación de su hijo.
texts.en:
María is 55 years old, she is married to Amilcar, who is 59 years old and has been a farmer for 20 years, they have one son and they live in Puyo, a city in the middle of the Amazon jungle in the western province of Pastaza at 924 meters above sea level, and it the capital of this province. It is demographically small, but has a wide variety of sites that are preferred by both domestic and international tourists, especially ecological activities and extreme sports. It is a city that has grown economically every day due to commercial activities, livestock, agriculture and tourism, because of which branches from financial establishments have been brought there because they want to take advantage of the economic activity that the city sustains. 
María decided three years ago to begin to sell natural personal care products because these products have helped her to reestablish her health and vitality. Despite the small support from her family and the lack of confidence people have in these products, María continues to be successful in her sales and she is applying for a loan from Fundación Alternativa in order to purchase more products and be able to maintain her stock and offer her products at a competitive price to her clients and in this way contribute to the recuperation of their own health. She is hoping to increase her earnings in order to help her husband with the maintenance around the house and the education of their son.

loans.use: purchase products and increase her stock.

loans.name: Araminda

texts.es:
Araminda tiene 42 años, es casada y vive en casa propia en el Distrito de Lambayeque. zona que tiene un moderado movimiento comercial, pertenece a la provincia del mismo nombre y se encuentra ubicada a veinte minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.


Araminda se dedica a la venta de helados y animales.  Paralelamente vende productos de belleza de venta por catálogo.  Ella con los ingresos que percibe de todas estas actividades solventa sus gastos y los de su casa.  En la crianza de animales tiene una experiencia de 5 años en el negocio, lo que ha hecho que tenga clientela fija, especialmente en los mercados.

Actualmente se ha propuesto incrementar su inventario en todo lo que es productos de belleza y la venta de helados.  Por ello ha creído conveniente obtener un préstamo de 3000 nuevos soles en Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Araminda is 42 years old, married, and lives in her own home in the Lambayeque district.  The area has a moderate commercial movement and is located in the province of the same name, about twenty minutes from the city of Chiclayo.  

Araminda works selling ice creams and animals.  She also works selling beauty products by catalog.  With the income she earns from all of these activities, she is able to meet all of her expenses and those of her household.  She has five years of experience with her animal sales business, and she has loyal customers, especially in the markets.  

She has decided to increase her inventory of beauty products and ice creams for sale.  To do this, she is requesting a loan of 3000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to purchase beauty products and ice creams to sell.

loans.name: Mwanachande

texts.en:
Mwanachande is 25 years old and lives with her two children. She is single and very hardworking, and she strives to get ahead. She has been buying and selling fish for two years. Her mother motivated her because she herself had always been engaged in this business.

Mwanachande sells her fish at the market and she says that she has already established a good client base. Her goal is to use the loan to buy more stock of fish and cooking oil.

She hopes to expand her business. Expanding her business and earning more profit will provide her family with a better life.

Mwanachande’s dream is to have a stall in the market since currently she is a street vender. She also wants to give her children an education so that they can have a better future.

loans.use: to buy more stock of fish and cooking oil.

loans.name: Dashbaljir

texts.en:
Dashbaljir is a 44-year-old married man who lives with his family in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. Dashbaljir's 9-year-old son attends the local primary school, while his wife looks after their 3-month-old son besides her work at the local secondary school. He works as a driver at local transportation company. 

Dashbaljir is requesting a 2,500,000 MNT (Mongolian Tugriks) loan to purchase necessary construction materials to finish his housing project. In order to complete the construction work, he needs to buy materials for the brick covering and interior structure as well. He is a responsible and ambitious man who is willing to provide a good quality life for his family. He is very thankful to the lenders who are giving him an opportunity to finish the housing project.

loans.use: to buy essential construction materials.

loans.name: Aziz-Un's Group

texts.en:
Aziz-Un is a 40-year-old married housewife who is living with her husband and two sons in Punjab, Pakistan. 

Since 2007 her husband has been running a shoe shop in the market while she herself sell shoes at home as well. Her elder son has completed graduation recently and she wants him to open a new shop in future. 

As a member of and eight-person lending group, Aziz-Un has requested a loan from Kiva partner BRAC Pakistan to help her husband to purchase more variety of shoes for the shop so that they can increase their sales and net income. 

She dreams for her children's bright future and desires to build her own house as she is living in a rented house with her family. She is very much thankful to BRAC and Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase a variety of shoes for her husband's shoe shop.

loans.name: Mwanatumu

texts.en:
Mwanatumu, 28, has three children and she lives in the municipality of Msambweni, Kenya with her children. She is a single mother.

Mwanatumu has her own clothing sales business. She’s been in business one year and was previously employed as a hotel attendant. She got a locale in the community near where she lives and sells Khangas (traditional African cloths), shirts, blouses, underwear and other items.

She will use the loan she’s requesting to stock up on clothes. She hopes to increase income and clientele. Her dream is to make the business grow to generate income to improve her and her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to stock up on clothes

loans.name: Parviz

texts.ru: Парвиз родился 1993 года в хорошей семье. С ранних лет он очень любил читать разные книги. Его развитый ум и толерантность позволили ему окончить среднюю школу с хорошими показателями и успешно поступить в университет. Данное время он является студентом 2-го курса Технологического Университета Таджикистана. В этом году его родители не в состоянии оплатить за его учебу в университете. Парвиз запрашивает займ для оплаты учебы в университете. Он ждет вашу доброту и надеется только на вас.
texts.en: Parviz was born to a good family in 1993.  From an early age he really loved to read all manner of books.  His highly developed intellect and fortitude allowed him to finish high school with good grades and succeed in getting into college.  In time he became a second-year student at Technology University of Tajikistan, but that year his parents couldn't afford to pay for his studies, so Parvix is seeking a loan to pay for college.  He's counting on your benevolence and his hopes are upon you.

loans.use: to pay for his university studies.

loans.name: Celinda

texts.es:
Celinda tiene 22 años de edad, conviviente y con 1 hijo. Vive en casa propia, la cual está ubicada en el Distrito de Tambogrande, un distrito dedicado principalmente al cultivo de frutas, las cuales son procesadas para ser exportadas a otros países. Pertenece a la provincia de Piura, en la región del mismo nombre, ubicada a más de tres horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo.  Celinda vive en la parte rural  de este distrito.

La actividad que desarrolla, es la crianza de ganado menor, como cerdos y aves de corral, los cuales cría, engorda y comercializa en el marcado local, clienta con más de 4 años de experiencia en su negocio, su conviviente lo apoya en sus actividades que realiza.

Celinda ha obtenido un préstamo de 500 nuevos soles en Edpyme Alternativa.  El destino del crédito será la compra de alimentos balanceados para el engorde de animales y venderlos a un mejor precio en el mercado local, esta inversión le permitirá seguir creciendo en su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Celinda is 22 years old and has a child with her partner.  She lives in her own home, which is located in the Tambogrande district.  This area mainly cultivates fruits, which are processed to be exported to other countries.  It is part of the Piura province in the region of the same name, located more than three hours from the city of Chiclayo.  Celina lives in the rural part of this district.  

She works raising small livestock such as pigs and poultry.  She raises them, fattens them, and sells them in the local market.  She has more than four years of experience with her business.  Her partner helps her with the work she does.  

Celinda has received a loan of 500 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  She plans to use the loan to purchase balanced feed to fatten the animals to sell them for a better price at the local market.  This investment will allow her to continue growing her business and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase livestock feed.

loans.name: Buyanjargal

texts.en:
Buyanjargal is a 29-year-old single guy who lives with his mother in an outer ger district (a ger is a traditional Mongolian nomadic felt housing tent similar to a yurt) of the city. He has been working in a Korean restaurant as a chef while his mother works as a cleaner at a local police station.

He is prepared to live with his fiancee at his current house but his house is very cold during the winter season, so he needs to set up a heating system. "I don't want to live with my future spouse in the cold, uncomfortable condition because we plan to have a baby very soon," he said. Thus, this loan will be used to set up a heating system and to make some renovations on his old unsafe house.

loans.use: to make some renovations before his wedding

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy mobile phone batteries, chargers and mobile phone calling cards

loans.name: Shahlo

texts.ru: Шахло 44 лет. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 4 детей. Ее муж Шавкат занимается скотоводством. Она более 15 лет работает в средней школе учительницей и является одной из успешных работников. У нее очень хорошие и умные дети. Ее дочь  в этом году поступила в университет. Доход Шахло и ее мужа не хватает оплатить за учебы дочери. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 500 долларов США для оплаты учебы дочери в университете. Шахло и ее дочь ждут вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Shahlo is 44 years old. She is married and raising 4 kind and intelligent children. Her husband Shavkat breeds livestock, while Shahlo is a high school teacher with over 15 years' experience, and is one of the more successful educators in her school. 

Shahlo's daughter has entered university this year. However, Shahlo's and her husband's combined incomes are insufficient to pay for their daughter's education, and so Shahlo is requesting a loan of US$500 to cover her daughter's tuition. Both mother and daughter are counting on your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter’s university education

loans.name: Maria Paula

texts.es:
María es una mujer con estudios primarios, tiene 47 años de edad, está casada con Segundo de 37 años quien se dedica a la cerrajería y trabaja por períodos de tiempo en el Oriente ecuatoriano, tienen 4 hijos de 15, 11, 9 y 8 años. Viven en Latacunga la capital de la provincia Cotopaxi en Ecuador una ciudad conocida por su rica gastronomía en especial las  “Hallullas” galletas duras en forma de pan que son tradición en Ecuador, Bolivia y Chile y además los “quesos de hoja”, además de actividad ganadera y agrícola que se sustenta gracias al clima templado, frío y cálido húmedo. El índice de pobreza supera el 50% pero al menos la mayoría de sus habitantes cuentan con servicios básicos en su vivienda. 
María se dedica a la compra – venta de frutas, legumbres y verduras  desde hace 18 años, actividad que aprendió de sus padres, y a la cual invierte de 10 a 11 horas diarias en su pequeño local. Sin la ayuda de nadie ella va a adquirir el producto y a pesar de tener solo estudios primarios, cuenta con un alto poder de negociación que lo adquirió empíricamente pues el momento de la compra se encuentra con varios revendedores  que distorsionan el precio real. María solicitó un préstamo para poder obtener una variedad más amplia de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes y de esta manera mejorar sus ingresos que posteriormente le permitirán cumplir su sueño de poder ver a sus hijos culminar los estudios. Gracias a Fundación Alternativa y su objetivo de apoyar a los microempresarios para disminuir la pobreza en el país, María podrá dar el primer paso para salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en:
María is a woman who has completed her primary school studies, she is 47 years old, she is married to Segundo who is 37 years old and works as a locksmith for periods of time in the Eastern part of Ecuador, they have 4 children who are 15, 11, 9 and 8 years old. They live in Latacunga, the capital of the province of Cotopaxi in Ecuador, a city known for its rich gastronomic tradition, especially "Hallullas," hard cookies in the form of bread that are a tradition in Ecuador, Bolivia and Chile as well as "quesos de hoja," as well as livestock activity and agriculture that is sustained thanks to the mild climate, cold and humid heat. The poverty index is more than 50% but the majority of people have basic services in their homes. 
María works purchasing and selling fruits, legumes and vegetables, she has been doing this work for 18 years, an activity she learned from her parents and one in which she dedicates herself to 10-11 hours a day at her small stand. Without anyone's help, she decided to acquire product and despite only having a primary school education, she is natural businesswoman and through her power of negotiation,  when she purchases a product she goes to various sellers to get the best price. María is applying for a loan in order to obtain a wider variety of products to offer her clients and in this way improve her earnings that will allow her to see her dream of her children finishing their education come true. Thanks to Fundación Alternativa and their objective to help small businesses in order to diminish poverty in the country, María will be able to take the first steps to success with her family.

loans.use: purchase fruits and vegetables to later sell.

loans.name: Tsogzolmaa

texts.en:
Tsogzolmaa is 48 years old and lives with her husband and six children in a very small ger, a Mongolian yurt, in Hovd province of Mongolia. 

Her husband's name is Nasan; he is 48 years old, and he operates a taxi service business. She has one child in college and three children in the secondary school. Tsogzolmaa started her own vegetable growing business in 1996. Therefore, she has many years experience in the organic vegetable growing and trading business. The local residents appreciate her as a woman with a good attitude. 

She has previous loan experience and has been paying her debt on time. Today, Tsogzolmaa needs a 2,500,000 MNT loan to harvest organic vegetables.

loans.use: To harvest organic vegetables.

loans.name: Vedat

texts.en:
Vedat is living in the Ashkali community in Kosovo. He is married and has two children, both of whom go to school. He is a very hardworking person. 

Vedat has run a tin business more than five years. He buys tin and then he shapes the tin into various forms depending on the needs of his clients. His business is related to home building. Most of the people who build a house need the tin for the roof in order to protect their home from water.

Vedat provides and shapes the tin for them based on their measurements and requirements. These types of clients are from his area and his business is very productive, allowing him to make a good profit. 

Vedat is in need of a loan to buy more tin for his business, which will help to expand the business and improve his standard of living with the increased income. He thanks all Kiva lenders for their support!

loans.use: To buy more tin for his business.

loans.name: Ulziidash

texts.en:
Ulziidash is 63 years old and lives with his wife in an apartment in Hovd province, Mongolia. His wife, Tserendulam, is on a pension. 

He worked as woodworking teacher in a secondary school. He retired on a pension in 2010. In 2011, he and his wife started a vacuum window-producing business to supply construction companies and individuals. Vacuum windows provide extra insulation.

He is planning to expand the business, which will increase the products he has for sale. He is a hardworking and modest person. He is requesting 4,500,000 MNT to buy a raw materials for his vacuum window-producing business.

loans.use: To buy a raw materials for his vacuum window-producing business.

loans.name: Michiko

texts.en:
Michiko is a hardworking mother who owns and manages a mini-grocery store in their community. This is her way of helping her husband in generating income for their family. They aimed to become financially stable in order for them to educate their five children and give them a better life. Despite problems and difficulties they encountered in life, they have the determination to work out their plans for they believed that, "patience and hard work will enable them to achieve their goals in the future."

To achieve their goals, Michiko aimed to acquire more grocery items and frozen food to sell in her mini-store. Due to insufficient capital, she is asking for an additional loan of  50,000 PHP to buy frozen foods, soft drinks, beverages, noodles, eggs, snack foods, soaps, canned goods and seasonings for sale. She hopes that this financial support will help her to improve the business and is hoping that they achieve their goals in the future.

loans.use: to buy frozen foods, soft drinks, beverages, noodles, eggs, snack foods, soaps, canned goods and seasonings for sale

location.town: Brgy. La Torre North, Bayombong,Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Naomi

texts.en:
Naomi is a 27-year-old married woman. She has 2 children with ages ranging from 3 to 8 years. She describes herself to be a business-oriented woman.

She operates a retail store where she sells items such as flour, steel wire, sugar, salt, cereals, etc. She has been involved in this business for 4 years. Her business is located within a busy environment and her primary customers are residents and daily consumers. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds for improving the retail business.

She will use the 20,000 KES loan to purchase a solar lamp which will be used by her family members for lighting. Previously, she had taken a loan with SMEP DTM which she managed to repay.  Her business goal is to open a supermarket within 5 years. She hopes that she will expand her business in the future. In addition, Naomi does farming which increases her business income.

loans.use: to buy a solar lamp

loans.name: Bahtier

texts.ru: Бахтиеру 35 лет. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 4 детей. Его жена портниха и занимается воспитанием детей. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми не обходимыми благами более 13 лет он занимается купле продажей DVD дисков. Он продает свой товар на местном рынке. Он очень упорно работает, но его доход не позволяет ему оплатить за учебу детей в школе. Он запрашивает займ для оплаты учебы 3  сыновей. Бахтиер и его сыновья ждут вашу доброту.
texts.en: Bahtier is 35 years old. Together with his seamstress wife, he is raising 4 children. In order to provide for his family, Bahtier has been selling DVDs at the local market for over 13 years. He works very hard, but his income is insufficient to pay for his children's schooling. Bahtier is requesting this loan to cover education costs for his 3 sons. The father and his sons are counting on your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for his children’s education

loans.name: Mario Alberto

texts.es:
Mario es un joven de 24 años soltero que tiene estudios superiores y vive con sus padres Mario de 52 años y María de 53. Viven en Latacunga la capital de la provincia Cotopaxi en Ecuador una ciudad conocida por su rica gastronomía en especial las  “Hallullas” galletas duras en forma de pan que son tradición en Ecuador, Bolivia y Chile y además los “quesos de hoja”, además de actividad ganadera y agrícola que se sustenta gracias al clima templado, frío y cálido húmedo. El índice de pobreza supera el 50% pero al menos la mayoría de sus habitantes cuentan con servicios básicos en su vivienda. 
Mario aprendió de sus padres a criar ganado para la posterior venta de ellos y además de la leche que producen. Hace 2 años decidió involucrarse más a fondo en el negocio y emprender con esta actividad a la cual se dedica 8 horas ene l día sin recibir la ayuda de nadie. A pesar de que muchos comerciantes se oponen a pagar un precio justo, Mario solicitó un préstamo con el que comprará más animales e insumos para su respectiva crianza y así poder ofrecer a los animales a un precio que le permita generar altas ganancias para crear un fondo de ahorro para un día cumplir su sueño de construir su casa propia. Mario recibió este crédito de Fundación Alternativa a quienes agradece por la asesoría oportuna y la confianza en la juventud emprendedora del país.
texts.en:
Mario is 24 years old, single, has attended university, and lives with his parents, Mario, 52, and Maria, 53.  They live in Latacunga, the capital of the Cotopaxi province.  In Ecuador, the city is known for its rich cuisine, especially hallullas (hard crackers made from bread that are a tradition in Ecuador, Bolivia, and Chile) and quesos de hoja (long sheets of cheese).  The area is also known for raising livestock and agriculture that is sustained by the mild climate, cold and warm humidity.  The poverty index is more than 50%, but the majority of the inhabitants have basic services (water, electricity, etc) in their homes.

Mario learned from his parents how to raise livestock for later sale and also to sell the milk that they produce.  Two years ago, he decided to involve himself more deeply in the business and learn this work, which he does for eight hours a day without help from anyone.  Although many merchants oppose paying a fair price, Mario is asking for a loan to purchase more animals and items to care for them so that he can offer these animals a price that allows him to generate a higher profit.  He will create a savings account so that one day he can achieve his dream of building his own house.  Mario received this loan from Fundación Alternativa and he thanks them for their advice and their confidence in the enterprising youth of his country.

loans.use: to purchase animals and items for their care.

loans.name: Deby

texts.en:
Deby is an Nusantara Maritime Academy student who studies shipbuilding techniques. He hopes to complete the program of study, but he has concerns about the cost of his studies. Since his parents work as a laborers and their income is not fixed, they can only meet their daily needs, making it difficult to finance his studies. 

Deby wants to be able to work on a ship as a ship technitian professional. He also does not want to pester his parents, because the parents have to pay for his sister’s schools. 

Deby wants to get a loan from Kiva to help pay for college. This way, he could complete his studies and help his parents' economic situation.

loans.use: To pay education fees for three years.

loans.name: Dugarmaa

texts.en: Mrs. Dugarmaa is 61 years old and lives with her husband in a small house in the Arhangai province of Mongolia. They are retired. Her husband's name is Tserendorj, and he helps with her business. She started her own felt-production business in 2005. She bought a new workplace in the ger (Mongolian housing tents) district. The ger district is not connected with social heating systems in Mongolia, where the peak cold weather reaches minus 40 degrees.  To fight the coldest weather, she is planning to purchase a gas stove to heat her workplace for better working conditions. Therefore, she is requesting a 5,000,000 Mongolian tugriks (MNT) loan for that purpose. She is an honest and hardworking woman.

loans.use: To purchase a gas stove to heat her workplace for better working conditions.

loans.name: Angelo

texts.es:
Angelo tiene 66 años de edad, es conviviente y sin hijos a su cargo. Vive en casa propia con su conviviente. La casa está ubicada en el Distrito de Las Lomas en Piura. Vive en la parte rural del distrito y no cuenta con los servicios básicos.
La actividad que desarrolla Angelo, es la agricultura, tiene 3.50 has propias, en la cual ha sembrado 2.0 has de mango y 1.0 has de limón, ambos cultivos se encuentran en producción.  También cuenta con plantas de banano y maracuyá.  Adicionalmente se dedica a la crianza de ganado menor (ovino y aves de corral), los cuales al alcanzar peso y tamaño ideal los comercializa en el mercado local.

Angelo quiere mejorar su producción de mango.  Es por ello que ha creído conveniente obtener un préstamo de Edpyme Alternativa de 3000 nuevos soles.  El destino del crédito será para la compra de fertilizantes para el cultivo.
texts.en:
Angelo is 66 years old, married, and has no children in his care.  He lives with his partner in their own home, located in the Las Lomas district in Piura.  He lives in a rural part of the district and does not have basic services (water, electricity, etc.).  

Angelo works as a farmer.  He owns three hectares of land in which he has planted two hectares of mangoes and one hectare of lemons.  Both crops are in production.  He also has banana and passion fruit plants.  Additionally, he raises small livestock (sheep and poultry) which he sells at the local market when they reach their ideal weight and size.  

Angelo wants to improve his mango production.  To do this, he has requested a loan of 3000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  He will use the loan to purchase fertilizers for the crop.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for his mango crop.

loans.name: Carolina Yacory

texts.es:
Carolina tiene 20 años de edad, es conviviente, con 01 hijo a su cargo. Vive en casa propia, la cual está ubicada en el Distrito de Tambogrande. Cliente vive en la parte rural  de este distrito. Pero aún no cuenta con servicios básicos.  Tambogrande es una zona agrícola de regular movimiento comercial que se encuentra situada en la provincia de Piura, a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo.


La actividad que desarrolla Carolina es la crianza de ganado ovino, porcino y aves de corral, teniendo actualmente 15 ovinos, 12 Cerdos y aves de corral, los cuales cría y engorda para luego comercializarlos en mercado local. Además cuenta con 0.5 ha de terreno que su padre le ha dado como herencia en el cual tiene sembrado limón que cosecha semanalmente. Su conviviente lo apoya en todas sus actividades que realiza. 

Carolina ha solicitado un crédito en Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles.  El destino del crédito será para la compra de alimentos balanceados para su ganado, esta inversión le permitirá seguir creciendo y así mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Carolina is 20 years old and has one child with her partner.  She lives in her own house located in the Tambogrande district.  She lives in the rural part of the district and does not have basic services (water, electricity, etc.).  Tambogrande is an agricultural area with regular commercial movement that is located in the Piura province, more than four hours from the city of Chiclayo.  

Carolina raises livestock such as sheep, pigs, and poultry.  Currently she owns 15 sheep, 12 pigs, and poultry.  She will raise and fatten them to later sell at the local market.  She also owns a half hectare of land that her father gave her as an inheritance where she plants lemons, which are harvested weekly.  Her partner helps her with all of the work she does.  

Carolina has requested a loan of 1500 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  She will use the loan to purchase balanced feed for her livestock, which will allow her to continue growing and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase balanced feed for livestock.

loans.name: Bekim

texts.en:
Bekim, 36, is married and has two children. He works as a driver and two years ago he started his own bus transportation business. He mainly provides transportation to students and workers within the area. He is very satisfied with the income he gets from this business. 

Bekim has asked for a loan of 2,000 euros to buy new tires and repair one part of the bus’ motor/engine. He also has two more buses that he uses for transportation. The loan will help him to be able to continue engaging in his business and hopefully expand his business with new lines of transportation in Kosovo.

He thanks all Kiva lenders!

loans.use: to buy new tires and to repair one part of the bus’ motor/engine.

loans.name: Furaha

texts.en:
Furaha is 40 years old. She operates a fish selling business, selling at the market. Her work is difficult since it requires her to go and purchase the fish from the fishermen and then remove the scales before frying the fish to sell. Furaha has a good customer base thanks to her good customer service. 

One of her dreams is for her children to attend college and pursue a professional career instead of having to struggle to make a living. She is requesting a loan to buy fish for her business. Furaha is grateful to Yehu for providing her with the opportunity to access business loans.

loans.use: to buy fish to sell.

loans.name: Saed

texts.en:
Saed is a 28-year-old young man, he is married and a father to one son.

For the past three years, Saed has been working in making gypsum decorations, which has been a profitable project and the only source of income to him. He has a good reputation in the market and has many loyal customers, but not enough to cover the cost of the business.

Saed is requesting a 1,000 USD youth loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing new shapes of gypsum and a new manufacturing kit. This will improve Saed's work quality and increase demand from his customers. This will increase his income and offer to him and to his family better living conditions. Saed is photographed while he is working.

loans.use: To purchase new shapes of gypsum and a new manufacturing kit

loans.name: Narangerel

texts.en: Ms Narangerel is 45 years old and lives with her three children in a little house in the Selenge province of Mongolia. Her eldest daughter is unemployed but she helps with her mother's business. Her oldest son is a student and her younger son goes to secondary school. She has been running a vegetable retailing business since 1997, so she has many years of experience in this business. This year she planted organic carrots, potatoes and garlic in a one hectare garden. She sells her business products at an exhibition in the capital city. She also has 44 heads of livestock (2 Cow, 29 Goat, 13 sheep), which produce wool, cashmere, and organic dairy products which she then sells in the summer. However, this is a seasonal business. Narangerel is a humble and honest woman who says ''I will pay my loan on time and expand my business". The total amount she is requesting is 1,000,000 MNT to pay the cost of the organic vegetable harvest.

loans.use: To pay the cost of the organic vegetable harvest

loans.name: Mwatime

texts.en:
Mwatima, 27, is from the town of Msambweni. She is single and lives with her son. She works selling fruits and vegetables in a little shed at the entrance to town.

With sacrifice and dedication she managed to get her son ahead, even while being alone. She is a very hardworking woman. She says she always has worked and she is not afraid of challenges. Her goal is to be able to continue growing and have a bigger store to continue educating her son.

Mwatima is coming to Yehu and to Kiva for a loan to buy vegetables such as tomatoes, green peppers, carrots, and onions, as well as seasonal fruit, in order to be able to supply her business with top-quality products to offer to her customers.

loans.use: to buy vegetables such as tomatoes, green peppers, carrots and onions, and fruits.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy goats & sheep for resale.

loans.name: Chalita

texts.en:
Chalita is 58 years old and married with 7 children.

Chalita works hard to provide for her family. She sells charcoal in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 29500 loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

Chalita has borrowed and paid 17 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been selling charcoal for 10 years and also earns an income from farming sugarcane.

Chalita aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Andres Enrique

texts.es:
Andrés tiene 60 años de edad, soltero y sin hijos. Vive en casa propia con su hermano y la familia de este. La casa está ubicada en la Caserío La Pala perteneciente al Distrito de Tambogrande. Cliente vive en la parte rural del distrito, pero cuenta con servicio de luz.

La actividad que desarrolla Andrés,  es la agricultura, para lo cual cuenta con 3.28 has, de las cuales 1.0 has son de mango y 0.50 has de limón; ambos cultivos bien conducidos y en producción. Cuenta con  más de 20 años de experiencia en la agricultura. Complementariamente se dedica a la crianza de ganado menor, los cuales al alcanzar peso y tamaño ideal los comercializa en el mercado local.  Con los ingresos que percibe de estas actividades aporta en los gastos de la familia.

Andrés ha solicitado un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles en Edpyme Alternativa.  El destino del crédito será para la compra de fertilizantes para su cultivo de mango.
texts.en:
Andrés is 60 years old, single, with no children. He lives in his own home with his brother and his family. This house is located in the small village of La Pala belonging to the district of Tambogrande. He lives in the rural part of the district, but has electric service.

Andrés works in agriculture, and has 3.28 hectares, of which 1 is mango and 1/2 hectare is lemon. Both crops are well managed and in production. He has more than 20 years experience in agriculture.

Additionally he raises small livestock which upon reaching ideal weight and size he sells in the local market. The income he receives from these activities helps with the household expenses.

Andrés has asked for a loan of 1000 soles from Edpyme Alternative. The loan will be used for the purchase of fertilizer for the cultivation of mango.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for his crop of mangos

loans.name: Eric

texts.en: Eric is a hardworking 27 year old man living in Kasese, Uganda. For two years he has been a doctor.  With his salary he has been able to pay school fees for his young brothers and also support his parents. Eric says that working in the health sector has always been his dream and he feels fulfilled with his life now that he can serve his community. He has personal goals of building a permanent home and up-grading in his studies while his business goal is buying land to grow crops. Eric intends to use the money from this loan to buy land for farming.

loans.use: to buy land for farming.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en: Francis is a 58-year-old married man with eight children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. Eleven years ago, he decided to buy land for commercial farming in order to support his big family and he got the initial capital from his salary savings as a teacher. Like most farmers he faces challenges such as price fluctuations, inadequate capital to purchase modern farming equipment and unpredictable weather changes.The client's personal goals are educating his children and building a permanent home while his business goals are diversifying his business to include a retail shop, buying land to grow more crops and expanding business into new markets. Fancis is requesting a loan to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children

loans.name: Josetie Aikpemi's Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est composé de deux femmes en caution solidaire. Josetie Aikpemila la responsable est âgée de 29 ans et mère de 02 enfants scolarisés. Le plus âgé a 9 ans et le moins âgé a 6 ans. Josetie Aikpemi vend des produits cosmétiques à son domicile depuis 05 ans et s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés du Bénin. Dans le souci d'augmenter son capital et de satisfaire la demande de ses clients, elle a sollicité et a obtenu un micro crédit à Finadev. Ce crédit lui permettra de maximiser son intérêt et de participer à la scolarisation de ses enfants. Josetie Aikpemi se retrouve à gauche dans la photo.
texts.en: This group is composed of two women taking out a solidarity loan. Josetie Aikpemila, the group’s leader, is 29 years old and the mother of two children who are in school. The eldest is 9 years old, and the youngest is six years old. Josetie Aikpemi has been selling cosmetic products out of her home for five years. She stocks up at a market in Benin. With the goal of bolstering her capital and meeting customer demand, she has requested and obtained a microloan from Finadev. This loan will allow her to maximize her profits and contribute to the payment of her children’s school fees. Josetie Aikpemi is on the left in the photo.

loans.use: to buy five dozens of body lotions, one dozen of creams, one box of hair gel and five dozens of hair extensions.

loans.name: Okta

texts.en:
Okta's ideal is to be a professional technician on ships. He is now taking lectures at the Academy of Maritime Nusantara. Working on a ship has been his dream since childhood. He is studying with determination and focus because he wants to quickly finish his studies. However Okta is very concerned about the continuation of his studies because of limited family economic resources. His parents only work as farmers and their income is erratic – just enough for their daily needs. Okta's two younger siblings are in school so the burden of responsibility on his parents is very heavy. 

Okta joined the student loan program from Kiva, so that his dreams of becoming a professional technician can be realized. He does not want to burden his parents and he is trying hard to help his parents and younger siblings. Okta is very grateful to Kiva lenders for the support so that he can continue his studies to completion.

loans.use: to pay education fees for three years

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy goats and sheep for resale.

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce is a hardworking woman. For years now, she has been working in the seafood business. She learned it out of the necessity to have a source of income for her family. Joyce buys her fish from fishermen along the coastal region of the city.

The loan she is asking for will be invested in buying more stock of fish, which will be paid for in full. Thus, she will invest it in her seafood selling business.

Joyce says that her business is profitable and that is why she has the urge to expand it and earn more income. With the income, she will save a little to continue educating her children.

loans.use: to buy more stock of fish.

loans.name: Nisreen

texts.en:
Nisreen is a 35-year-old young woman. She is married and a mother of three sons and two daughters. Her husband is a worker who earns a modest salary which is not enough to cover the family's needs.
For the past four years, Nisreen has been doing embroideries and selling them to customers upon their request. It has been a profitable venture but it also needs support from time to time to cover the cost.
Nisreen is requesting a loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs of purchasing new fabrics and threads. Taking this loan will increase demand and requests from her customers to buy embroideries. This will increase her income and provide her family with better living conditions. Nisreen is photographed while she is doing embroidery.

About Shariah-compliant lending:

FATEN offers loan products that are designed to serve borrowers all over Palestine, including some religiously conservative areas. A key tenet of Islam is the prohibition of interest in the lending or accepting of money. This prohibition is based on the belief that money should be seen only as a medium of exchange and that it has no value in itself. FATEN has adapted the terms of this loan to fit the cultural context by attaching a 0% interest rate to the loan. In order to cover its costs, FATEN does charge a servicing fee. The amount you see fundraising includes both the principal loan and the loan servicing fees. As with all Kiva loans, you should expect to have your funds returned to you in accordance with the repayment schedule attached to this loan. For more information on lending in the Muslim world, please visit Kiva's Muslim World Lending helptext: http://tinyurl.com/3aekx8m.

loans.use: To purchase fabrics and threads

loans.name: Silver

texts.en: Silver is a 47-year-old married man living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He buys and sells cocoa and has been in business for sixteen years. Since cocoa is a seasonal crop, he is challenged by price fluctuations, seasonal weather changes and high transportation costs leading to minimal profits.The client's personal goals are educating his children, building a permanent home and buying a car to ease his work. Silver is hopeful that if he can hire employees to help expand the business, move the business to a more permanent location, and expand the business into new markets, he would reap tangible profits.The purpose of the loan is to buy more cocoa to sell.

loans.use: to buy more cocoa to sell

loans.name: Santos Humberto

texts.es:
Santos tiene 41 años de edad, es casado, y vive junto a su familia en el Caserío Zapotal Tabacal perteneciente al distrito de Túcume. Dicho distrito es un buen destino turístico por las ruinas ancestrales ubicadas en ese lugar.
Santos se dedica a la agricultura, además hace 5 años se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores en la parte posterior de su domicilio, cuando ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta a los negociantes que visitan con frecuencia la zona. Esta actividad le provee de una fuente estable de ingresos con los cuales saca adelante a su familia. Su cónyuge elabora y vende chicha, ayudando con los gastos de la casa.

Santos desea mejorar la crianza de sus animales adquiriendo alimento balanceado de modo que puedan ser vendidos a un mejor precio, para lograr su objetivo se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles.

Santos es un padre bastante trabajador y que siempre vela por el desarrollo y bienestar de los suyos.
texts.en:
Santos is 41 years old, married, and lives with his family in Zapotal Tabacal, a small rural community in the district of Túcume. This district is a good tourist destination because of the ancient ruins located there.

Santos is a farmer and has also been raising and selling small animals for five years. He keeps them in the back area of his house, and when they reach a good stage of development he offers them for sale to the merchants that frequently visit the area. This business provides him with a stable source of income, which he uses to provide for his family. His spouse helps with home expenses by making and selling chicha.

Santos wants to improve his animal raising by purchasing balanced feed, so that he can sell them at a higher price. In order to achieve his goal he has had to request a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 2,000 nuevos soles.

Santos is a hardworking father and he always looks out for the development and welfare of his family.

loans.use: to purchase balanced animal feed.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy cigarettes & cold drinks

loans.name: Graciela

texts.es:
Graciela tiene 54 años de edad, viuda y con 05 hijos, de los cuales 03 son dependientes. Vive en casa propia con sus 05 hijos. La casa está ubicada en el Distrito de Tambogrande. Clienta vive en la parte  rural del distrito, pero cuenta con servicio de luz.

La actividad que desarrolla Graciela, es la crianza de ganado vacuno, ovino y porcino, los cuales le producen leche y/o carne para su comercialización en el mercado local. Complementariamente cuenta con 1.0 ha de terreno agrícola, en donde tiene mango en producción, el cual es asistido por sus hijos mayores.  Cuenta con más de 15 años de experiencia en la ganadería.  Graciela es una mujer luchadora que con su trabajo ha podido administrar su casa y solventar sus gastos y los de su familia.

Graciela anhela que su ganado esté bien desarrollado para poder venderlo a buen precio en el mercado local.  Es por ello que para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente obtener un préstamo de 2000 nuevos soles en Edpyme Alternativa.  El destino del crédito será para la compra de alimento balanceado para su ganado.
texts.en:
Graciela, 54, is widowed and has five children, three of whom are dependent.  She lives in her own home with her five children.  The house is located in the rural area of the Tambogrande district but she has electricity.

Graciela's work is raising cows, sheep, and pigs, which produce milk or meat for her that she sells in the local market.  She also has one hectare of cropland where she's growing mangos with the help of her older children.  She has more than 15 years of experience in livestock.  Graciela is a fighter whose job has helped her manage her household and pay her expenses and her family's.

Graciela wants her livestock to be well developed so she can sell it for a good price in the local market.  This is why, to achieve her goal, she believes it advisable to get a loan for 2000 nuevos soles [PEN] from Edpyme Alternativa.  The loan is to buy balanced feed for her cattle.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for her livestock

loans.name: Mary Dagny

texts.es:
Mary tiene 31 años de edad, es casada y vive junto a su familia en casa propia ubicada en el Caserío La Raya en el Distrito de Túcume, zona turística que a su vez pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  

Mary es una mujer bastante trabajadora, se dedica a varias actividades como crianza y venta de animales menores, venta de pollo (en peso muerto), además posee una mototaxi (motocicleta que lleva anexada una cabina utilizada en el transporte de carga y pasajeros) y se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad.  Con los ingresos que percibe de estas actividades puede solventar sus gastos y los de su familia. Su esposo se dedica a la agricultura.
